Text:
As someone who has burned a ton of backups, I've never had any issues until I burned Arkham City. In the middle of playing, the "Disc is Unreadable" error would come up. I burned a second copy and the same thing happened. Verbatims on a flashed iHas on a 3.0 Xbox. So I thought no biggie when the Game of the Year Edition was released. But guess what? Same thing! 

Anyone having similar issues?

Downloading this one from monza in hopes of a different result.
